name: Garden of Eldritch Delights
description:
our entry into LUDUM DARE 52 - Harvest.

Garden of Eldritch Delights is a fast-paced competitive gardening arena where the players assume control of 2 acolytes rivaling to make offerings to their gods.

Out-harvest, out-smart and out-offer your opponent to summon your master and WIN.

by: 

 Game Design, Music, Sound: Ali @ https://autumnmnmn.itch.io

 Art Lead: Bee @ https://tinyworkerb.itch.io

Game Design, Art, Animation: Martin @ https://elmartipro.itch.io

Programming: Miksu @ https://blockybear.itch.io/

Game Design, Technical Artist : Nicole @ https://grapetwig.itch.io
